title: Typophile Forums Are Up!
content:
Submitted by [Jared Benson](http://web.archive.org/web/20090714061703/http:/typophile.com/user/3 "View user profile.") : 7.May.2003 6.52pm 

We're pleased to announce that Typophile Forums are back up and ready!   
   
We can't express enough how much we appreciate the outpouring of support and suggestions we received during our downtime.   
   
The outage was directly attributed to the amount of traffic/activity Typophile is seeing combined with inadequate resources on behalf of our host. Watch for more news in this space as we consider our alternatives.   
   
In order to try and keep our host happy we've had to **temporarily** delete any messages older than 720 days in hopes of lightening server load. We'll do everything in our power to ensure this type of outage doesn't happen again.   
   
The floor is yours! [http://www.typophile.com/forums/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090714061703/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/)   
   
Best,   
Jared & Joe   
Typophile Admins
author: Jared Benson
